    Mirco Daniel, Achim Zielesny

      • DepthFirstPath

        public DepthFirstPath(int[][] aAdjacentArray,
                      int aStartParticleIndex)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aAdjacentArray - an adjacent array. First index gives the index number of the previous particle. Second index gives the position of each neighbor particle indices.
        aStartParticleIndex - start particle index.
